Key Match Events: Iceland scored early through Jon Dagur Thorsteinsson
England struggled defensively in the second half
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate's team flattered to deceive in creative terms
Post-Match Reflections: The home fans booed the team off after the match
Others: John Stones took a heavy challenge at the outset and made way at half-time
Aaron Ramsdale was slow to react to Thorsteinsson's goal
Kobbie Mainoo and Phil Foden could get little going in midfield
England did not look as though they believed they would equalise as the second-half minutes ticked down
